short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides tooling for integrating Monopolis with your VCS provider

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Monopolis is a platform for powering engineering teams working with code Monorepos, and provides a tooling layer over the top of your existing VCS provider (GitHub/GitLab etc) to activate features such as monorepo property visualisations, true CI/CD, and advanced build pipeline visualisations.

This browser provides the missing link between Monopolis and your VCS provider - allowing your to effortlessly navigate back and forth between them and to unlock user-level Monopolis features.

Current features include:
- Navigate between linked pages of Monopolis <--> GitHub on both the reposiotory and commit levels.
